summary: Iteration 6 - React web app conversion testing completed. All 11 frontend features verified working: Landing page, Navbar, Mobile hamburger menu, Presale page, Portfolio page, Affiliation page, Opportunities page, Profile page, Routing, Presale progress API, and Responsive layouts (mobile/tablet/desktop). Backend APIs confirmed working (35/39 tests passed - 4 failed tests are stale test expectations, not actual bugs).

minor.issue: 4 test failures due to stale test expectations: price_usd expected 2.5 but is 0.2 (correct), presale config tests expect MongoDB updates but presale now reads from on-chain data

issues: Filter buttons blocked by fixed navbar when scrolled - use force=True or scroll adjustment (minor UX issue)

critical_code_review_comments: All pages load correctly with data-testid attributes for testing
Navigation works between all 6 pages without 404 errors
Mobile hamburger menu opens/closes correctly with all nav links
Presale progress API returns real on-chain data: $791.08 raised, 4 participants
Referral code URL param (?ref=QTMTEST1) correctly pre-fills form
Responsive layout verified on mobile (375px), tablet (768px), and desktop (1920px)

success_rate.backend: 90% (35/39 tests passed - 4 failures are stale test expectations)

seed_data_creation: None needed - used existing test data
context_for_next_testing_agent: This is a fresh React+Vite web app replacing the previous Expo/React Native mobile app. All pages working: Landing (hero, presale progress, value props, CTA, footer), Presale (form with validation, price calculation), Portfolio (disconnected state with CTA banner), Affiliation (disconnected state with feature list), Opportunities (4 cards with filters), Profile (disconnected state). Mobile hamburger menu working. Backend APIs returning real data from Solana blockchain.

navbar.nav_links: PASS - All 6 links visible: Accueil, Presale, Portfolio, Affiliations, Opportunites, Profil

mobile_menu.mobile_nav_links: PASS - All 6 mobile nav links visible when menu open

presale_page.form_fields: PASS - firstName, lastName, email, wallet, tokens, referral inputs

affiliation_page.feature_list: PASS - '5 niveaux de commission', '38.5% de commission totale', 'Suivi en temps reel'

opportunities_page.filter_buttons: PASS - All, Open, Closed, Funded filters
opportunities_page.opportunity_cards: PASS - 4 cards: NeuroTrade AI, BlockGuard Security, DataVault Protocol, MetaHealth AI

responsive.mobile_375px: PASS - All elements visible, hamburger menu works
responsive.tablet_768px: PASS - Form fields and layout correct

backend_tests.failure_notes: 4 failures are stale test expectations in test files, not actual backend bugs

features_verified: Landing page loads with hero section, presale progress card (real API data), value proposition cards, affiliation program section, CTA, footer
Navigation bar renders with all links (Accueil, Presale, Portfolio, Affiliations, Opportunites, Profil) and Connect Wallet button
Mobile hamburger menu opens/closes on small viewport
Presale page loads with form fields (firstName, lastName, email, wallet, tokens, referral), payment method toggle (card/crypto), total price calculation
Portfolio page shows disconnected state with connect wallet CTA
Affiliation page shows disconnected state with connect wallet CTA and feature list
Opportunities page loads with 4 opportunity cards and filter buttons (All, Open, Closed, Funded)
Profile page shows disconnected state with connect wallet button
Routing between all pages works without 404 errors
Presale progress data fetches from /api/presale/progress and displays correctly
Responsive layout works on mobile (375px), tablet (768px), and desktop (1920px)
